message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $115. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we settle at $110? That's a very competitive price for this quality.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above your target. How about we meet in the middle at $107.50? I'm willing to compromise to get this deal done.
